title: Possible origin for new champ (Bard)
body:
When i saw the new champ only one thing came to mind, The character San from the studio Ghibli film 'Princess Mononoke'
I have included pictures for comparison, San is a forrest girl in a world full of spirits, the similarities in her mask and in Bard's face/mask? are very striking
and the little forrest spirits that are a common theme throughout the film are almost identical to Bard's meeps and they also make a chiming sound wherever they are.
well this was my thought anyway, i love how riot does source things from other games/tv shows/movies because it makes the game so much more interesting.

also I'm really looking forward to the new champ h looks like a lot of fun and i like his theme

replies.body:
Copyright discovered.

Good to know they still aren't being original with their designs.

Its actually a very clever marketing ploy, you feel an affinity towards things you are familiar with, for example most people if they drink out of a blue cup will be more limey to pick out the blue cup from the cupboard next time than a red one they have not used, its the same here, anyone who has watched the movie will be more likely to buy the champ that has similarities to it.
its made me really want to play the champ now xD cos i love that movie
